content: wrap yourself in cozy warmth with this beautifully crafted knit-look crochet cowl made from the softest hygge yarn hygge pronounced hoo-gah is the danish word for a feeling of contentment and well-being and this cowl embodies that essence perfectly the gentle texture mimics a classic knit pattern offering both style and comfort the delicate plush fibers of the yarn create a luxuriously soft cloud-like feel against your skin ideal for chilly days when all you want is to stay warm and relaxed its stylish construction complement any outfit making it a versatile addition to your winter wardrobe embrace the snug beauty of this cowl and experience the joy of hygge with every wear **sizes** one size fits most **skill level** easy **recommended yarn** 132 yd 121 m size 5 yarn 1 skein red heart hygge in cloud used in sample **hook** us size k 6 5mm crochet hook **notions** yarn needles scissors **gauge** 11 sts by 9 row = 4 in 10 cm **finished measurements** 40 in 101 cm in circumference **terms used in pattern** back loop only chain half_double_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch es stitch es tristan stitch
